1.title: Just Arrived

11.content:
First, where are you from?

Atlas? The cold frozen kingdom up north.

Vacuo? The hot desert area down south?

Mistral? The kingdom to the far east?

Vale? Where the tournament is actually taking place?
11.title: You Get Some Character Development Before You U...

111.content: What do you look like?
111.title: Atlas

1111.content:
https://images.app.goo.gl/D3sgnSukMyHDuD...

Your name was Tyrian Clematis.

You were a student at the Atlas Academy in the great Kingdom of Atlas. You were average height with short messy black hair and light brown eyes. Your favorite colors were purple and black. Your right eye was wrapped in bandages due to it getting injured in a Grimm ambush during a first year mission. It will heal, but the doctors warned you that it would be after the festival. For now, you had to fight without your full vision. It was a challenge, but you persevered. The Grimm attack did have an upside.

The shock allowed you to unlock your Semblance.

Mind Control.

You found out you could control the minds of Grimm. It saved your life. When you took over the Beowolf and used it to kill the others while your arm, too badly damaged, hung at your side, You duel wielded one handed axes that were also short range guns, but could be combined into a sniper. Without use of one of your arms, you would have been toast.

Back at school, you never told anyone about it. People were sure to stop trusting you if they knew you could control their mind. During your free time, you experimented to see what you were and were not capable of. What you found was the following:

• You could not directly take control of more than one person at a time.
• If you took direct control of someone, you could see through their eyes and feel what they were feeling. Your body collapsed where it was so there were limits to this ability. As far as you could tell, once you took control, there was no range limit.
• You could influence around half a dozen people at once with limited mental orders. Example: If you told people to ignore you, they would. Complicated orders reduced the number of people you could affect. When you started, you could only affect 2-3 at a time. Practice helped a lot.
• Weirdly, you couldn’t read minds. You could order people to give you information or write it down, but you couldn’t get it directly from their minds.

Back in Atlas, their regiment was strictly structured. In Vale, he had a lot more freedom and was interested in seeing what kind of mischief he could use his powers for.

Next, who were his teammates?
1111.title: Tyrian Clematis

11111.content:
You were one of the lucky one. All three of your teammates were girls.

The first girl in his team was Ciel Soleil.
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby...

Ciel had dark skin, short, navy blue hair and blue eyes. She also had a gold marking consisting of an oval shape surrounded by four smaller circles in the center of her forehead. She tended to wear a blue beret, a plain gray button-down shirt with an asymmetrical collar and matching leggings, a blue combat skirt, and fingerless, elbow-length black gloves with a wristwatch on her left hand and black shoes.

The one thing that bothered you was Ciel was very regimented and by-the-book. Her tone was usually monotonous and she didn’t seem to understand common sayings. Like if you asked her to wait up for a minute, she would literally time you for a minute. Most people would just stop and wait. Other than that, she seemed to be loyal to the team. Her timekeeping also came in handy. There were many times you would have missed class without her.

The next member of your team was a strange girl. Penny Polendina.
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby...

Penny had short, rather curly orange hair with a small ahoge on top that came down to her chin, and she liked to wear a pink bow on the back of her head. She also had bright green eyes, light skin and freckles. Her traditional outfit consisted of a whitish-gray old-fashioned blouse with short gray feminine overalls as well as a black and green collar with a matching pair of stockings.

Penny was amiable, excitable, kind, and curious, but had a distinct lack of social awareness. The concept of personal space and the difference between a boy who is a friend and boyfriend concept escaped her. She also didn’t spend a lot of time with the team outside of class. From what you gathered, she was related to a famous scientist and might even be the niece of the famous General James Ironwood himself. The main thing that interested you about her was the fact your power didn’t work on her.

You never found out why.

The last girl on your team was a wolf Faunus. Lana Lupin.
https://images.app.goo.gl/qiiiEx5XnqsYaH...

She had long silver hair and two wolf ears on the top of her head. Her eyes were also green, but not as bright as Penny. She tended to wear a grey corset, a revealing red top that opened around the corset, and covered her shoulders, along with matching red gloves. Long white pants with brown belts completed her outfit.

As a Faunus, a lot of people didn’t trust her. The White Fang was not popular up there. You got to know Lana and discovered she HATED the White Fang. They only made life difficult for other Faunus. Plus, if you didn’t agree with them, you were against them, even as a Faunus. While she always acted like she was somewhat of a fashionista, she also kicked your ass at video games constantly. Out of your team, she was the one you got along best with.

Now, where are you starting your adventure?
11111.title: Team TPCL (Tropical)

111113.content:
Beacon was a lot more disorganized than Atlas Academy.

Students were mulling around everywhere and classes weren’t in session. Back home, while you did have free time, it was kept in certain areas. Here people could travel between the school and Vale without any sort of reason. It felt… nice. You liked having freedom. This also gave you a great opportunity to test out your new power. The goal was to keep it hidden except as a final trump card if it meant the difference between winning and losing the Vytal Festival.

Looking around, it seems like the training hall would be a good place to check out. There was bound to be a couple free rooms to do some practice. The ride over here had been long and you might get the opportunity to see how strong the Beacon students were. If you could get some one on one time with them, there was a chance you could practice your Semblance. Using your Semblance would actually allow you to convince them to spar with you if you wanted.

As you walked by several groups of people, you couldn’t help admire the sights. Many of the girls wore very revealing clothing, unlike the Atlas uniforms. This could be fun. Unfortunately, most of the training rooms were locked. Privacy was respected here and it was to keep people from spying on others. Eventually, you came to an unlock room. Smiling to yourself, you entered.

Turns out, the room was occupied.

Who was there?
111113.title: Time to Explore Beacon

1111131.content:
An attractive blonde with long hair and a rather impressive bust size was smashing some training droid around like they were large aluminum cans.
https://images.app.goo.gl/pVepbCXTiLcDgz...

She wore a tan jacket that showed off her midriff, with short, puffy sleeves with black cuffs that feature two gold buttons. Underneath this, she wore a low cut yellow crop top with her emblem on the left breast in black. Below that she had on a brown belt and black mini-shorts. Lastly, she had knee-high boots and orange over the knee socks.

“Phew.” The girl wiped her brow with her arm. “That was a good warm up. Time to start the real work out.” She noticed you standing in the room and you realized she had lilac eyes. “Hey. Occupied, dude. Wait your turn.”

“Sorry!” You apologized. “The door was unlocked and I didn’t realize anyone was in here.”

“Oh… that’s my bad then.” She grinned at you. “I would let you stay, always more fun with an audience, but my teammate of mine would have my head if she found out a competitor was watching me train. You understand?”

“Yeah, I do.” You nodded and then realized you were in a great position to practice your Semblance on the girl. Looking at her, you pushed your thoughts into her mind. Willing her to let you stay. Keeping suggestions vague tended to make it easier for you. The target would make up a reason for it. “Sorry for bothering you.” You pretended to turn around when the girl interrupted.

“Wait!” She shook her head. “You know what? Screw Weiss. Want to come hang out a bit? Name’s Yang. Yang Xiao-Long. What’s yours?”

“Tyrian Clematis.” You answered and shook her hand.

“So,” Yang said to you with a grin. “Xiao-Long have you been watching me?”

You almost considered seeing if you could erase your own memory of that pun.

“I just got here.” You answered honestly. “Saw a few punches that turned those bots into scrap.”

“Impressed?”

“Definitely. You might actually stand a chance against one of my teammates. She’s super strong.”

“Oh?” Yang raised an eyebrow. “How about you and I spar a bit? I could use a real workout. Unless you don’t think you can handle a girl like me.”

“I’m pretty strong.” You countered. “Wouldn’t be a team leader if I wasn’t.”

“So, want to accept my challenge?”

You thought about it. Practicing using your ability in a fight would be good practice. You might be able to figure out the most efficient method in fighting people with it. Of course, your eyes traveled down the girl’s frame. She was really attractive. You could use your ability to make her want to talk and get to know each other instead of fighting. Then there was the erotic option. Your Semblance could encourage you to have some naughty fun with each other behind closed doors.

choices: Someone was trying to catch Nora.
111113132322332.content:
“Huh, sorry. What happened?”

A young woman with fair skin, short orange hair and turquoise eyes stared back at you.
https://images.app.goo.gl/bDPpputaHWvf1T...

“I… bumped into you.” You said a little worried. The collision wasn’t that hard, so she shouldn’t have suffered brain damage. Right?

“Oh, no big deal, I bump into people all the time.” The girl said, hopping to her feet. “Name’s Nora. What’s yours?”

“Tyrian-…”

“Wow, do you go here? Of course you don’t. You’re uniform is different. You’re one of the transfer students for the festival right? Are you strong? My team is really strong. You don’t have to worry about bumping into me. Oh, do you like pancakes?”

“Wha-…huh…yes?” Your mind was overloaded by the girls’ sudden barrage of questions and statements.

“Cool, I can’t stand people who think waffles are better than pancakes.” Nora grinned and gave you a hug. “Anyway, I got to go meet Ren. Cya!” She ran off down the hallway before your brain clicked into place.

113.title: Mistral

1133.content:
Your name is Thanos (Meaning Immortal) your the leader of Team Time.

Your Color is Amaranth. This is the color of your hair.

You have bandages on your hands because there are a lot of scratches you have from all the fight you have with Grimm protecting your village.

You have a lot of aura.

You unlike most you don’t use a weapon you excel at hand to hand combat.

Your semblance is mind control. You will know your semblance work because the people you use it on eyes will turn pitch black. You can use your semblance on more then one person at a time, but if you do it will cause all the energy to drain out you and you will pass out. Your semblance will still work. It won’t work if you try it on more then two. You also can’t use it, if you have taken a lot of damage recently.

Your semblance works as such. You can use it on almost any one and they will do anything you say but the bigger the task or the less they want to do it the more energy it takes to use it.

Just like the Schnee’s your semblance is hereditary. It came form your father’s side of the family.

He’s symbol is an Ankh in the color amaranth.

You weren’t born in the main city, you were born in one of the villages just outside of the big city.

You accepted into Haven after a professor saw how good you were at fighting the Grimm.

You have a sibling, just one. (Writer can decide if it’s a brother or sister and if they have this semblance as well)

Only one Person knows what your family’s secret semblance is.

She was born in the main city of Mistral to a somewhat wealthy family.

She loves to read and take notes on battles, she even has a big notebook that she writes everything in. She is scared of you because she knows what your semblance is and how powerful it can be.

Her weapon is a bow and arrow, each is infused with dust giving each shot an elemental effect. The quiver’s color is olive green. The bow is just a basic shade of purple.

Her semblance is a passive one it allows her to hear and see better then a normal person.

Mathew Wakes Up In Dorm-rom Next To Glynda
12.content:
As you get off the airship and walk in Beacon. You remember someone saying the first thing you should do is go talk to Professor Ozpin, the headmaster or Glynda Goodwitch, the highest ranking teacher. You think about it for a minute then decide to go talk to Glynda. You got some time to kill anyways scenes the rest of your team hasn't shown up yet. You start talking to people and find out that Glynda is in the teachers break room, so that's were you go.

As you arrive, you begin to look around and there are no other students or teachers around, prefect. So you just walk up to the door and begin to knock, but before you do, you hear not just one voice but two voices. You recognize one of the voices as one of your teammate, the redhead with glasses, Mirai. (Future)(You can develop her more later) "Shit I might have to use my semblance." You think. It dose take a lot of energy to use it on just one person and there's two people in there.

There conversation ends and the door opens and out comes Mirai with Glynda right behind her. "And who's this." Glynda asks. Before you even have time to answer, Mirai dose "This here is the leader of my team, he's name is Mathew." (Gift of god) You can tell she seemed a little sacred as she spoke and Glynda could tell too.

"So this is the guy you told me about, nice to meet you Mathew. My name is Glynda." She says cautiously. "Well I'm going to head back to my dorm room." You hear Mirai Say, as she backs away, clutches her book in hand. "Where are you going, Mirai." You couldn't help yourself. "Nowhere." She says, as she stops moving and her eyes turn pitch black. Glynda turns and sees the color return to Mirai's eyes.

"So this is the semblance she told me about." Says Glynda as she keeps looking at Mirai. "What Semblance?" Right as you say that your head started throbbing with pain, your legs become shaky and your vision becomes blurry. "What are you talking about sir..." Even thought it's a blur you can still see Glynda shut her mouth as only one eye darkens. "What the fuck is going on? Why didn't it work." You say as you fall to the ground. You feel like you want to pass out, but don't. Not yet anyways, You keep your blurry eyes on Glynda as you can see that her legs are shaking. seconds later she falls to the ground. You eyes close as all you can hear is heavy breathing coming from Glynda. Mirai is still not moving or saying anything. The last thing you can remember hearing/seeing is Glynda's eyes start to tear up as she starts to moan and starts to slowly *cum. Glynda now just sits there as the ground is all wet she doesn't move or say anything just like Mirai.
12.title: You Go See Glynda Goodwitch

choices: The First Person You Meet Is Someone Named Yang Xiao Long
The First Person You Meet Is Someone Named Ruby Rose
14.title: Something Else

142.content:
You begin walking around Beacon. "Wow this place looks really nice, way better then the place I go to school." You look up at the CCT tower. "So my room is in the second building, first floor, room, five. I better go there and wait for the rest of my team to show up."

As you begin to walk to your room, you watch as a girl swings a giant scythe right over your head. The scythe weapon then slowly starts to shrink down. The girl puts it on her back.

She turns around. "Sorry for almost hitting you, are you ok? My name is Ruby by the way." She looks worried. "Ya, I'm alright, cool weapon you got there. The girl Ruby's eyes light up as you mention her weapon. "You like it." "Ya, that weapon is super neat. I especially like how it fold like that." Ruby spouts a fact about her weapon. "Did you know its also a gun." "Cool how did you make it." You ask. "I got some help form my uncle Qrow. I don't see any kind of weapon on you. So if you don't mind me asking, whats your weapon." That made you excited, but as excited as Ruby, as she responds with... "Yes" "Ok, then i will show it to you, but you can't tell anyone else about it, ok. She nods.

You "pull out" your weapon. "I don't see anything." Ruby says confused. "Are you sure." You say back. "Yes I'm sure I..." Ruby stops what shes saying. You start to see her eyes darken. "Your right Ruby my weapon is not on me because I left it back in my room. You can see my weapon if you want. You just have to follow me to my room." You smile. "Sure I'd love to."Ruby says as the color returns to her eyes.

"Ok, lets go Ruby." Ruby doesn't say anything and just follows you to your room. It takes you a minute to find, but you eventually find your room. Ruby is still right behind you, not saying anything. You unlock the door and see a redheaded girl (One of your teammates. You can develop her later) sitting on one of the four beds. "Hi Thanos." (Immortal) You look over at her. O, Hi Mirai." (Future) You don't sound interested. "Who's the girl you got there." She points to the girl standing behind you. "Her name is Ruby, "Ruby, what a nice name. Hi Ruby." She waves. "Ok, that's enough it's time for you to leave." You sound mad. "But..." "I don't care get out." You see Mirai's eyes darken as she gets up off the bed and walks out.

She sits by the door in the hallway with her book. She sees a faunus girl pass by reading a book. She could tell she was faunus even though she was wearing a bow on her head. The bedroom door closes.
142.title: The First Person You Meet Is Someone Named Ruby...

choices: You Decided To Go To The Vytal Festival Tournament Arena.
You Decided To Go To The Cafeteria
The First Person You Meet Is A Member Of Your Team (Writer Makes Character)
143.title: Something Else

choices: Follow Her To The Stands To Watch The Fight
Go To The Prematch Waiting Area
1431.content:
You arrive at Beacon and think to yourself "I got sometime before my teammates arrive and there's a practice match starting soon in the arena." You get on the first airship heading up to the arena. Just as your about to board the airship, you are stopped by someone. " Hay Thanos (Immortal) wait up." You look over and see a redheaded girl about 5'4 come up to you. "O, hi Mirai."(Future) She has her glassing on and shes holding a book in her hand. "where are you going?"She asks. "I'm going up to the arena to watch a match that's about to start" You sound annoyed. "Oh, can I come. I would love to study the fight." Mirai says with excitement. "Sure." You say as both of you get on the airship.

As you arrive at the arena you notice that there aren't that many people around, and that's when you spot two people, one going in, and one coming out of the waiting area. "Have fun out there Pyrrha." The girl named Pyrrha flashes the other girl a smile. "I sure will Ruby." She says.

"Come on Thanos were going to miss the start of the fight if we just stand here." You feel Mirai Pulling on your arm.
1431.title: You Decided To Go To The Vytal Festival Tournam...

choices: You Just Sit And Watch The Match
You Get Board And Decide To Use Your Semblance
Someone Else Shows Up (Writer Picks Who)
14311.content:
"Ok, I'm going. You can stop pulling now." Mirai can see your annoyed and says. "Sorry I'll just go find us a seat." And just like that she walks off to do just that. You keeping your eyes on the girl named Pyrrha and see her step into the arena with another girl. As you are about to head to the stands. You see the girl Ruby run past you.

You end up sitting near the front next to Mirai. As you sit down you see her put the book she was reading away and pull a notebook out of her bag with the words battle notes written on the front. You hear on the loud speaker that the two people who are going to fight are Pyrrha Nikos and Coco Adel. Just as the match starts two more people sit down next to you. You recognize one of them as the girl you saw earlier Ruby but you don't recognize the other one.

"Ruby tell me again why you deiced to drag me here." The girl in with says. "Come on Weiss don't you want to support your friends? Go Pyrrha!" Ruby screams.
14311.title: Follow Her To The Stands To Watch The Fight

choices: The First Person You Meet Is Someone Named Weiss Schnee
The First Person You Meet Is Someone Named Pyrrha Nikos
No As You Look There Are Two People

info.brief_description: The title says it all. I don't really don't care what you write have have fun.
info.description:
Welcome to Beacon. You are a First year who just arrived in time for the Vytal Festival Tournament. You have the power to control peoples minds, and your here to have fun. (You are the leader of a team with 3 females and one of them is a faunus)

Rules
1. Please try to make somewhat long chapters
2. You don't have to put a something else option if you don't want to
3.Never be the one to end a story line, always include 2/3 options
